testsuite.name: dev.angzarr.examples.customer.cucumber.CucumberTestRunner

testcase.name: Add loyalty points to existing customer
Cannot add points to non-existent customer
Cannot redeem more points than available
Cannot redeem points from non-existent customer
Lifetime points not reduced by redemptions
